mapper.select: select a.board_num, a.user_name, b.nick_name, a.title, a.content, a.created_at from board a join user b on a.user_name = b.user_name where del = 0 order by created_at desc;
mapper.insert: insert into board(user_name, title, content, created_at, del) values (#{userName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, 0);
insert into board_reply(board_num, reply, reply_at) values(#{boardNum}, #{reply}, #{replyAt});
